articles.author: Amanda Chu
articles.title: Americans are buckling under medical bills. It could get worse. - Politico
articles.description: Charities that help people pay for care say demand is way up. That’s before scheduled Medicaid and Obamacare cuts take effect.
articles.content: Financial assistance from the HealthWell Foundation, one of the largest charities in the country, is already 23 percent higher this year than all of last year. Requests swamped the fund it launched t… [+6923 chars]
